User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0b12) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0b12
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0b12) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0b12

The add-on bar, when having icons placed in it by add-ons, shows the window resize gripper in an arbitrary location, while it should always remain the right-most element in the add-on bar (corner of the window).

Since the gripper and add-on icons cannot be positioned in the "customize" mode for toolbars either in b12, it can't be corrected.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. enable the add-on bar
2. install an add-on that places an icon in the add-on bar (e.g. adblockplus)

Actual Results:  
The gripper is put to the left of the add-on icon in the add-on bar

Expected Results:  
The gripper should be in the corner of the window, always.
